title: The Headshot Intensive with Peter Hurley
summary: A promotional overview of Peter Hurley's 2-day headshot photography workshops, featuring testimonials on his teaching style, the hands-on coaching environment, and the career-changing impact of mastering headshot photography.

steps.action: Adopt a mindset of open knowledge sharing, learning exact settings and details from the instructor.
Engage in a 2-day immersive workshop environment to learn directly from industry leaders.
Receive hands-on, one-on-one coaching to tweak and refine photography techniques.
Practice through repetition to slow down the process and internalize the skills.
Select a workshop location (e.g., Los Angeles, New York, Chicago) and book a spot.

key_takeaways: Peter Hurley teaches by sharing every detail, including specific camera settings, without holding back secrets.
The workshop emphasizes repetition and hands-on tweaking of skills rather than just theoretical learning.
The community surrounding the workshop (The Headshot Crew) mirrors the instructor's philosophy of helping others.
Attendees report significant career growth and financial success after mastering the headshot workflow.
